p: 2.5 mL blood was collected in anticoagulants free containers to obtain serum for ELISA (PanBio®, Brisbane, Australia) were used for detecting dengue IgM antibodies. All the patients’ serum samples were screened for DFV [ 35] and YFV using rapid strip tests, IgM antibodies against DENV and YFV were negative in all suspected cases.
